page.title: 11A TRANSPORT SURVEY
page.content: Durham Road is the main route from Consett to Stanley and a by-pass is now being built to ease congestion through Annfield Plain.Durham County Council and the E.E.C.Regional Development Fund are paying for it.Traffic going past school will be reduced by half.Vehicles going in the Hare Law direction will still need to use Durham Road.Friday is the busiest day for traffic passing school and afternoons are busier than mornings. 75% of the people in Annfield Plain have their own transport.80% of parents of children in school have a car.The most popular make is Ford.More people have British cars than foreign ones.The Morrison Road Ends Garage is the most popular for petrol at Â£1.97 for 4 star but the Fine Fare in Stanley is cheaper with 4 star costing Â£1.96.
